location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The documents in the file are arranged in chronological order. There are some notes at the end of the file (folio 624). The file notes are arranged chronologically and refer to the documents within the file; they give brief description of the correspondence with a reference number, which refers back to that correspondence in the file.
The foliation is encircled in pencil, in the top right corner. It begins on the front cover, on number 1, and runs through to 625, ending on the inside of the back cover of the file.

mods.abstract: The file mainly contains Royalty Delivery Tickets showing the amount of oil delivered for refining from January to June 1944, transmitted by Bahrain Petroleum Company Limited (BAPCO) representatives to the Political Agent at Bahrain.
